vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Freebie.GetFreebie (patch_15.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_15.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_15.sol#15)

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_15.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_15.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Freebie.Command (patch_15.sol#27-31):
	-require(bool)(adr.call.value(msg.value)(data)) patch_15.sol#30
